message: This is a fair offer, Bob! You get a small share now, but I'm sure you'll agree it's better than risking it all in the next round.
You didn't take the easy way out, I'll give you a slightly smaller share now, but still a good one!
Alright, Bob, let's be reasonable. I'm willing to compromise, but this time I'll be taking a larger share.  Let's end this game and get this money in our pockets.
You're getting greedy, Alice. I'm willing to give you a tiny share, but I'm taking the lion's share now.
